Source.Name: uncrustify
Source.Summary: Source code beautifier for C, C++, CSharp, ObjectiveC, D, Java, Pawn and Vala
Source.Description: Source code beautifier for C, C++, CSharp, ObjectiveC, D, Java, Pawn and Vala. The goals of this project are simple: Create a highly configurable, easily modifiable source code beautifier.
